comment: Wathen operates his studio like a professional firm, prioritizing meeting deadlines over a strict teacher-student dynamic. He offers personalized one-on-one critiques, assisting with design concepts and vocabulary. He encourages exploration of individual designs, he readily supports understanding and accommodates workload flexibility. Take him!

He is very fair with his expectations. Though he will get mad if you fall behind. He is pretty down to earth and will help as long as you have the work to show. He also likes to talk to students individually rather than as a group, which has its pros and cons.
